skins.shipDescription: Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number one - Akatsuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Akatsuki, a special-type destroyer! Destroyer Division Six consisted of me and my sisters! I was the first to be built and the first to be sunk! The Battle of Guadalcanal? I-I was trying to cast my light on the enemy! I was by no means scared of them! ... Ahem, you shall witness how strong I truly am... that you will!
skins.acquisition: I am Akatsuki, the oldest ship of Destroyer Division Six! Well met, Commander. I sincerely hope you will let me rebuild Division Six! ... Huh?! You do not permit the formation of destroyer divisions?!
skins.login: My name is Akatsuki, I am the ninja who will banish all the darkness in the world! ... Whoa! Commander, w-when did you get here?!
skins.details: T-the reason I sleep with the lights on is because... i-it is not because I am afraid!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Sometimes I do not understand what Ikazuchi and Inazuma are trying to say...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Can Hibiki find her way here on her own? It has me somewhat worried...
skins.secretaryIdle3: W-w-what! Anyone would be shocked from suddenly seeing a person's shadow cast in the light in the middle of the night!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: S-should you touch me there again... then I will not be able to restrain myself!

skins.shipDescription: Is this the place called the Northern Parliament?! It is colder than I thought... Th-thank goodness I brought gear for extreme environments! Hibiki, please wait a bit longer! Your sister is coming to see you!
skins.acquisition: Is this the place called the Northern Parliament?! It is colder than I thought... Th-thank goodness I brought gear for extreme environments! Hibiki, please wait a bit longer! Your sister is coming to see you!
skins.login: Being fully prepared is the key to going in the right direction! Say that again? The East lies *that* way?
skins.details: I made friends of these bears on my journey! I suggest you try befriend them too, Commander... Er, forsooth!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I've still not found Hibiki... I really do wonder when we'll meet again.
skins.secretaryIdle2: It is thanks to my compass that I have arrived at the Northern Parliament! Huh? How long has the needle been frozen in place?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm curious as to how Ikazuchi and Inazuma are faring...
skins.secretaryTouch: Would you care to harken to one of my tales of valor?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oooh, I feel myself warming up! I don't know why, though... Something about it feels strange.

skins.shipDescription: What do you think, Commander? I have a brand new outfit and a brand new companion! I am no longer a plain old ninja... I am now a motoninja!
skins.acquisition: What do you think, Commander? I have a brand new outfit and a brand new companion! I am no longer a plain old ninja... I am now a motoninja!
skins.login: Motoninja Akatsuki, reporting in! Commander, your orders please!
skins.details: My companion and I have shared so many miles together... Hm, maybe next time I should call my cohorts to take her for a spin together!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My companion's lights are strong indeed, but I still find these night roads rather difficult...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Back before I had broken her in, my companion here gave me a lot of trouble. But these days? We move as one and the same!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Inazuma and Ikazuchi are going to be impressed with my companion!
skins.secretaryTouch: I'm afraid you can't ride her, Commander...
